titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 3) to prohibit the procedure commonly known as partial-birth abortion.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-290, by Mrs. Myrick.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 107.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 383.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/2/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 3 (partial-birth abortion ban).
